Women's Neuropsychiatry Book Chapter

Dr. Salama is first author of the Women’s Neuropsychiatry chapter of Neuropsychiatry and Behavioral Neurology: Principles and Practice. This chapter discusses some of the sex-based differences in neurologic and psychiatric disorders. The psychiatric disorders discussed are those that are related to, or influenced by, the reproductive events in a woman’s life including perimenstrual disorders, perinatal disorders, and perimenopausal disorders.
